meanings.sent1: I will desugar the cake to make it healthier.
meanings.sent2: She decided to desugar her coffee to reduce her sugar intake.
meanings.sent3: The dessert looked sad after I desugared it.
meanings.sent4: Desugaring the tea of sweetness left only bitterness behind.
meanings.sent5: The process of desugaring the soda was like watching sugar disappear into thin air.

meanings.definition: To make something less sweet by removing sugar.
meanings.sent1: In order to cut calories, I will desugar the lemonade.
meanings.sent2: The chef had to desugar the sauce to balance the flavors.
meanings.sent3: The cookies were so sweet that desugaring them felt like a crime.
meanings.sent4: Desugaring the jam turned it from a sugary treat to a tangy spread.
meanings.sent5: The task of desugaring the candy was like turning a sugary dream into a bland reality.
